text:
@RealJamesWoods Now we know that all we have to do is take a 2 week dose of Hydrochloriquine + Z-pac with zinc 
or Vitamin C, and it will prevent #COVID19 .  The false Lancet Study 
made news when it came out, but when it was retracted for being wrong, the media was quite. 

#CovidHoax
